tool_description: Monitors customer participation in marketing campaigns and awards campaign-specific bonus points.

participation_type.description: Type of participation: email_click, survey_complete, social_share, purchase, review

error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer must be enrolled in the loyalty program.
Invalid campaign_id: Campaign does not exist or is not currently active.
Invalid participation_type: Use one of [email_click, survey_complete, social_share, purchase, review].
Invalid participation_timestamp: Must be valid ISO 8601 format and within campaign period.
Already participated: Customer has already completed this participation type for this campaign.
Campaign ended: Campaign participation period has ended.
usage: Provide customer_id, campaign_id, participation_type, and participation_timestamp. Include participation_value for purchase-based campaigns.

campaign_points_earned.description: Points earned from this campaign participation

campaign_progress.description: Customer's progress status in the campaign

completion_bonus_eligible.description: Whether customer is eligible for campaign completion bonus

participation_id.description: Unique identifier for this participation record
